text: Looks like it's a day of CI scripts :sweat_smile: . Is there a reason why the Documentation Github Action sometimes is not able to find new versions of a dependent package for days? I'm quite confused. <https://github.com/SciML/NeuralPDE.jl/runs/1847125033?check_suite_focus=true> from <https://github.com/SciML/NeuralPDE.jl/blob/master/.github/workflows/Documentation.yml>

text: Can we cross post this publicly to <https://discourse.julialang.org|Discourse> for further visibility? React with :bridge: on the message above to approve. <https://github.com/JuliaCommunity/SlackBridge/blob/main/README.md#faq|More info here>

Success, it has been cross posted <https://discourse.julialang.org/t/54771| to Discourse>. Keep and eye out on Discourse for responses and please add an answer there once you are satisfied with the solution so others can benefit as well. Happy debugging!
The reason is probably ~PkgServer~ StorageServers being sad
but the normal CI scripts are fine?
